confcost.controller.algorithm

Class Signature

  • java.lang.Object
    • confcost.controller.algorithm.Algorithm
      • confcost.controller.algorithm.Signature
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    SHA1Signature, SHA256Signature

    public abstract class Signature
extends Algorithm
    Superclass for signature algorithms.

    To add an additional signature algorithm, the following steps must be taken: 1. Implement a new subclass of Signature 2. Register this subclass to Signature (see register(Class, Collection)) 3. Register this subclass to Algorithm (see Algorithm.register(Class, String)) 4. (optional) Create a subclass of SignatureConfiguration or expand the functionality of an existing subclass and add the creation logic to AlgorithmConfigurationFactory.create(Class, confcost.model.Model)

    Author:
    Marc Eichler
